text:
When I open the new tar file with Winzip I see files with uppercase WEB-INF and
lower case web-inf.

This is a well known winzip issue, use cygwin tar to
see the tar file:


<project default="d">
  <target name="d">
    <delete quiet="yes" dir="files"/>
    <mkdir dir="files/WEB-INF"/>
    <mkdir dir="files/dir"/>
    <touch file="files/dir/a.txt"/>
    <touch file="files/WEB-INF/a.txt"/>
    <tar destfile="tar.tar">
      <fileset dir="files"/>
    </tar>
    <shellscript shell="bash" xmlns="antlib:net.sf.antcontrib">
      tar tf tar.tar
    </shellscript>
  </target>
</project>
